fields.summary: Android: Module build does not fail if building with an invalid NDK version

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h5.Description

When building an Android module there is currently no verification of the NDK versions. So when building with an unsupported version there is no feedback to the user.

We should follow the standards and error on versions that are lower, warn on higher version.
fields.summary: Android: Validate NDK versions on module build
